long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
this is a chrome extension for students who sit down for hours before studying for a test, simply building a quizlet. through flash.me you can build your quizlet as you write notes, annotating important facts said in class, articles, or that you think of!

HOW TO USE IT
- as you are taking down notes in class, and you spot an important fact, copy the keyword-definition pair of that fact
- copy that into flash.me
- after a couple classes and a couple cards made, you will have a whole quizlet set prepared
- once you feel that your quizlet set is ready, click upload and watch your quizlet be made in seconds!
